text: David McDonald (born 2 January 1971) is an Irish retired football defender. At Tottenham he only made three league appearances, one of which was playing the full 90 minutes as his side beat rivals Arsenal at Highbury on the last day of the 1992-93 season. ==References== * *Since 1888...
